column.name: NM
column.value: Financial System Document Type & Existing Records Only

column.name: PERM_TMPL_ID
column.valueComputed: (select perm_tmpl_id from krim_perm_tmpl_t where nmspc_cd = 'KFS-SYS' and nm = 'Create / Maintain Record(s)')

column.name: KIM_TYP_ID
column.valueComputed: (select kim_typ_id from krim_typ_t where nmspc_cd = 'KFS-SYS' and srvc_nm = '{http://kfs.kuali.org/kfs/v5_0}financialSystemDocumentTypeAndExistingRecordsOnlyPermissionTypeService')

column.name: KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID
column.valueComputed: (select kim_attr_defn_id from krim_attr_defn_t where nmspc_cd = 'KR-WKFLW' and nm = 'documentTypeName')

column.name: KIM_TYP_ID
column.valueComputed: (select kim_typ_id from krim_typ_t where nmspc_cd = 'KFS-SYS' and srvc_nm = '{http://kfs.kuali.org/kfs/v5_0}financialSystemDocumentTypeAndExistingRecordsOnlyPermissionTypeService')

column.name: KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID
column.valueComputed: (select kim_attr_defn_id from krim_attr_defn_t where nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS' and nm = 'existingRecordsOnly')

column.name: ROLE_ID
column.valueComputed: (select ROLE_ID from krim_role_t where NMSPC_CD='KFS-SYS' and ROLE_NM='Manager')
